original_title: The Fairy Tales of the Brothers Grimm: Snow White / The Wolf and Seven Little Kids
overview: This animated tale, adapted from the Grimms' "Snow White," tells the story of a beauty and her evil stepmother, whose jealousy is thwarted by the kindness of strangers. A bonus feature, "Snow White / The Wolf and the Seven Little Kids" is included.
title: The Fairy Tales of the Brothers Grimm: Snow White / The Wolf and Seven Little Kids
